docs.snippet: The slavery drama "12 Years a Slave" won the best picture Oscar on Sunday, becoming the first film from a black director to win the film industry's top honor in the 86 years of the Academy Awards....
docs.lead_paragraph: The slavery drama "12 Years a Slave" won the best picture Oscar on Sunday, becoming the first film from a black director to win the film industry's top honor in the 86 years of the Academy Awards.

headline.main: '12 Years a Slave' Wins Best Picture Oscar
headline.print_headline: '12 Years a Slave' Wins Best Picture Oscar

docs.snippet: Matthew McConaughey won the Oscar for best actor on Sunday for his role in "Dallas Buyers Club" as a homophobic, rodeo-loving Texan who contracts AIDS and becomes an unlikely savior for gay patients and drug addicts desperate for treatment....
docs.lead_paragraph: Matthew McConaughey won the Oscar for best actor on Sunday for his role in "Dallas Buyers Club" as a homophobic, rodeo-loving Texan who contracts AIDS and becomes an unlikely savior for gay patients and drug addicts desperate for treatment.

headline.main: McConaughey Wins Best Actor for 'Dallas Buyers Club'
headline.print_headline: McConaughey Wins Best Actor for 'Dallas Buyers Club'

docs.snippet: Matthew McConaughey has won the Academy Award for best actor for his performance as a desperate and determined AIDS patient in "Dallas Buyers Club."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Matthew McConaughey has won the Academy Award for best actor for his performance as a desperate and determined AIDS patient in "Dallas Buyers Club."

headline.main: McConaughey Wins Oscar for Best Actor
headline.print_headline: McConaughey Wins Oscar for Best Actor

docs.snippet: Cate Blanchett has won the Academy Award for best actress for her bravura performance as a fragile socialite experiencing a meltdown in Woody Allen's "Blue Jasmine."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Cate Blanchett has won the Academy Award for best actress for her bravura performance as a fragile socialite experiencing a meltdown in Woody Allen's "Blue Jasmine."

headline.main: Cate Blanchett Wins Oscar for Best Actress
headline.print_headline: Cate Blanchett Wins Oscar for Best Actress

docs.snippet: Australian Cate Blanchett won the best actress Oscar on Sunday for her role as a socialite who suffers a breakdown in Woody Allen's "Blue Jasmine."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Australian Cate Blanchett won the best actress Oscar on Sunday for her role as a socialite who suffers a breakdown in Woody Allen's "Blue Jasmine."

headline.main: Cate Blanchett Wins Best Actress Oscar
headline.print_headline: Cate Blanchett Wins Best Actress Oscar

docs.snippet: Mexican director Alfonso Cuaron won the Oscar for best director on Sunday for the space thriller, "Gravity," in which an astronaut fights for her survival after being cut loose from her space shuttle....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mexican director Alfonso Cuaron won the Oscar for best director on Sunday for the space thriller, "Gravity," in which an astronaut fights for her survival after being cut loose from her space shuttle.

headline.main: Alfonso Cuaron Wins Best Director Oscar for 'Gravity'
headline.print_headline: Alfonso Cuaron Wins Best Director Oscar for 'Gravity'

docs.snippet: Alfonso Cuaron has won the Academy Award for best director for the visually groundbreaking lost-in-space spectacle "Gravity."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Alfonso Cuaron has won the Academy Award for best director for the visually groundbreaking lost-in-space spectacle "Gravity."

headline.main: Alfonso Cuaron Wins Oscar for Best Director
headline.print_headline: Alfonso Cuaron Wins Oscar for Best Director

docs.snippet: Also on the Minute, the Oscar Pistorius "trial of the century" begins and Samba as a form of therapy in Rio....
docs.lead_paragraph: Also on the Minute, the Oscar Pistorius "trial of the century" begins and Samba as a form of therapy in Rio.

docs.snippet: "Let It Go" from the Disney musical "Frozen" has won the Academy Award for best original song....
docs.lead_paragraph: "Let It Go" from the Disney musical "Frozen" has won the Academy Award for best original song.

headline.main: 'Let It Go' Wins Oscar for Original Song
headline.print_headline: 'Let It Go' Wins Oscar for Original Song

docs.snippet: After the grind of her first Oscar season, Lupita Nyong’o won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress. It wasn’t a surprise for David Carr or A. O. Scott, but that doesn’t mean “it’s not cool.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: After the grind of her first Oscar season, Lupita Nyong’o won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress. It wasn’t a surprise for David Carr or A. O. Scott, but that doesn’t mean “it’s not cool.”
